title: LADY
lyrics: Come On Come On Come On (Come On Ladies) Come Back To Me Back To Me Back Boy (Come On Ladies) Come Back To Me Back To Me Back Boy   A jikdo nan ne ape seoitji Momyeon hago sipeun mam keo jyeoitji I Can Feel About Ur Feeling Ireon nega miwo Can’t You Feel It? Mwoga geuri geupae No No No Daehwajocha mothae No No No Naega neol butja beul sidojocha mothage gune Chi sahae jinjja neo wae i reoke mot dwae Woo malhaji anado neuk kyeojyeo Geu reoji malgo nal ana jwo Yeogiseo geuman du Jan mareun malgo dasi dorabwa My Baby Baby Just Stop Baby Just Stop Oh Yeah Ijen naega jigyeoungeoni geu nyang sireojingeo ni Geuman dujan mal mothae an dari nan geo ni Oneulmalgo naeilhae naeilhae naeilhae OR (oh woa oh woa) Ttak haruman Babe Babe Babe OR OR (oh woa oh woa) Sireo geu reon ne pyo jeong Amuri saenggakhaedo igeon aniraedo Nan mot badadeu ryeo Jigeum ira do Rewind sikyeojwo Deoneun nan mureulge ne chae chae chaegim Kkaejin yuricheoreom an butdeorado Naega butyeobolge Let’s Get Get Get It Woo geureon malhaji ma rajwo Geunyang jangnan ieotda malhae jwo Yeogiseo geuman dul Saenggageun malgo dasi dora bwa My Baby Baby Just Stop Baby Just Stop Woo~ Ijen naega jigyeoungeoni geu nyang sireojingeo ni Geuman dujan mal mothae an dari nan geo ni Oneulmalgo naeilhae naeilhae naeilhae OR (oh woa oh woa) Ttak haruman Babe Babe Babe OR OR (oh woa oh woa) Ireoke naeili jinamyeon Maeili himdeul geot ga ta Amu jitdo hajima Sigani gyesok heulleo gandaedo Neon naege neon naege You Are Ma Ba Babe Baby Let’s Get It Boy Don’t Fake It Dum Muh Dum Muh Dum Dum Muh Dum Muh Dum Baby Let’s Get It Boy Don’t Fake It Dum Muh Dum Muh Dum Dum Muh Dum Muh Dum Dum Dum (Come On Ladies) Dum Muh Dum Muh Dum Dum Muh Dum Muh Dum (Come On Ladies) Dum Muh Dum Muh Dum Dum Muh Dum Muh Dum Dum Dum Ijen naega jigyeoungeoni geu nyang sireojingeo ni Geuman dujan mal mothae an dari nan geo ni Oneulmalgo naeilhae naeilhae naeilhae OR (oh woa oh woa) Ttak haruman Babe Babe Babe OR OR (oh woa oh woa)
